title: The Secrets Of Car And Driver's Lightning Lap Revealed - /DRIVEN
description:
Go behind the scenes with Car and Driver magazine editors as they pummel Virginia International Raceway for three days with 25 of the world’s best sports cars.

Their object is to set benchmark lap times that compare a cars’ performance against other cars in its price range. They publish the results once a year in the Lightning Lap issue. 

Exciting? Yes. Easy? Hardly. Here’s a behind-the-scenes look at how they do it.
